original_title: Violetta En Vivo en Buenos Aires
overview: "Violetta Live" is a high-quality show with a great 'mise-en-scène', choreography, costume design, light effects and incredible multimedia work. It shows us a story full of emotion and joy, where all the members of the cast of the teen soap opera participate, and a musical repertoire that includes all the hits, as well as great surprises.
title: Violetta Live
